title: Cristina Zavalloni & Louis Andriessen
content: Dutchman Louis Andreissen and Italian vocalist Cristina Zavalloni have developed a close working relationship which began in 1998 with Passeggiata in tram in America e ritorno, and includes the 2010 monodrama, Anaïs Nin.
contentSnippet: Dutchman Louis Andreissen and Italian vocalist Cristina Zavalloni have developed a close working relationship which began in 1998 with Passeggiata in tram in America e ritorno, and includes the 2010 monodrama, Anaïs Nin.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 3
itunes.subtitle: Mezzo Cristina Zavalloni and composer Louis Andriessen talk about their work together
